title: Ravioli
directions: Mix 4 eggs, water, oil and salt and add to well.
Mix mixture with flour using fingers until good consistency.
Refigerate as a ball wrapped in plastic for 1 hour.
Using a pasta maker knead dough on largest setting 4 times.
Slowly go down settings thinning down dough to a `5` setting.
Make an egg wash by combining two eggs with 2 tsp of water and whisking.
Place layer of dough on a metal ravioli template.
Push a large marble sized filling into each square.
Brush egg wash around each pocket then cover with another layer.
Use a rolling pin, roll over top of template and cut raviolis out.
Set to dry for 3 hours and freeze raviolis at least overnight.
To cook, boil for 3 mins, then cook in any sauce for another 5.
